+++ SUMMARY

  * general-purpose programming language 
  * an extension of the C programming language
  * object-oriented, generic, and functional features in addition to facilities for low-level memory manipulation


  * two main components: 
    * 1) a direct mapping of hardware features provided primarily by the C subset, 
    * 2) zero-overhead abstractions based on those mappings
